an3.70:3.11: kiñcanatasmiṃ → kiñcanattasmiṃ (bj) | kiñcanaṃ tasmiṃ (si, s1-3, pts1) | kiñcanatasmi (?), katthaci → kismiñci (s1-3) | kassaci (pts1), kiñcanatatthī’ti → kiñcana nātthīti (bj) | kiñcanatthīti (s1-3) | kiñcanaṃ natthīti (pts1)
an3.70:16.4: cātumahārājikā → cātummahārājikā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), tatuttari → tatuttariṃ (bj, pts1) | taduttari (s1-3)
an3.70:17.2: gerukañca paṭicca, nāḷikasaṇḍāsañca → nāḷikañca paṭicca saṇḍāsañca (pts1, mr)
an3.70:28.2: pahūtarattaratanānaṃ → pahūtasattaratanānaṃ (bj, s1-3, km) | pahūtamahāsattaratanānaṃ (pts1), issariyādhipaccaṃ → issarādhipaccaṃ (pts1)
an3.70:35.1: na haññe → na hāne (bj, pts1) | na hane (mr)
